H0.text: Water covers most of the Earth's surface.

H1.text: Bare rock covers most of the Earth's surface.

H2.text: Farm land covers most of the Earth's surface.

H3.text: Cities and towns cover most of the Earth's surface.

A4.text: Liquid water is present on Earth, covering 71% of its surface.

A5.text: Water covers about 71.0% of the Earth's surface, with seas and oceans making up most of the water volume (about 96.5%).
